comment.author: 51930879@N03
comment._content: Probably Kingsway, today Republic Street - pre-1962 and definitely not earlier than 1959. After the failure of integration talks between Malta and the UK, the Labour party club (upstairs balcony) supports the call for independence from the UK.

comment.author: 62760997@N05
comment._content: I used to go shopping on this street before this shop opened !  Lived in Malta from 1950 to 1953 when my husband was stationed at Hal Far Fleet Air Arm base.
